articles.title: Garrett Crochet, Roman Anthony named finalist for Cy Young, Rookie of the Year Awards
articles.description:
Crochet led the AL in both innings pitched (205.1) and strikeouts (255).

The post Garrett Crochet, Roman Anthony named finalist for Cy Young, Rookie of the Year Awards appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Garrett Crochet named finalist for Cy Young Award, showcasing Boston's pitching talent.
Crochet led AL with 205.1 innings pitched and 255 strikeouts in 2025.
Roman Anthony contends for Rookie of the Year, highlighting Boston's promising future.

articles.title: Ranking top priorities for Patriots at NFL trade deadline
articles.description:
The Patriots have several needs, including another running back and an edge rusher.

The post Ranking top priorities for Patriots at NFL trade deadline appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots prioritize acquiring a running back and edge rusher before the NFL trade deadline.
Team management, including Eliot Wolf, is actively seeking trades to strengthen the roster.
Local fans hope these additions will improve the team's performance this season.
